title: 300 Feet Below
description: Bud plays catch with flipper, teaching him how to retrieve items from the ocean floor. An SOS comes through; Bill Darmon has been attacked by a shark and needs blood urgently. Porter contacts the Coast Guard to arrange the blood delivery before going out with Bud to rescue Bill. The helicopter arrives but during the transfer the blood is lost overboard. A number of attempts are made to retrieve it but a persistent shark stops all efforts till Flipper comes to the rescue, fights off the shark and brings the blood up.

title: The Red Hot Car
description: After Bud sees a car at the bottom of the bay with bullet holes int he windshield, he asks his father to investigate. But Porter is used to Bud's exaggerated stories and vivid imagination and declares he doesn't have time. Before leaving for a meeting, he orders his sons to stay away from the car, but the boys soon find a pretext on which to once again go to that section of the bay. Unfortunately, they had already questioned several people about the car and one of them is responsible for that car. The boy soon learn a lesson in why it's very important to obey your parents!

title: S.O.S Dolphin
description: Flipper saves a marine doctor poisoned by a fish sting.

title: The Gulf Between
description: Bud, worrying about Po getting married, is trapped by storm and tide in a sea cave.

title: City Boy
description: Mike Belden gets to spend some time with the Ricks family, after his mother remarries and heads out for a honeymoon. As a city boy he struggles to adapt to the lifestyle of the Florida Keys. He is concerned about his mother remarrying and seems on a path of self destruction, first crashing a speedboat then disobeying diving instructions. Ultimately he talks Sandy into diving a dangerous wreck, where they become trapped and only the quick thinking flipper alerts Sandy's father and the boys are saved just as their air runs out

title: Dolphin for Sale
description: Dorrie Stone kidnaps Flipper. When Sandy and Bud tell their Dad, all three of them go to investigate.

title: Not Necessarily Gospel
description: An old man fills Bud's head with heroic tales, but his father warns him all the stories aren't necessarily true. Circumstances force Bud to realize then, but he wants to be a hero by finding the poachers who almost killed his father.

title: Countdown for Flipper
description: When Po sends the boys on an important errand, he tells the boys to leave Flipper at home. Flipper's life is in danger after it's believed he ate a rare fish that had been studied for many years. Bud and Sandy must get to their dad and warn him within a half hour. But they soon discover the truth and wonder how they'd get themselves out of their mess.

title: Mr. Marvello
description: Bud and Sandy hear Flipper say in plain English he wants to leave for London with Professor Marvello, and the professor's circus colleagues bring nets to take Flipper away.

title: My Brother Flipper
description: Flipper saves the life of an old Greek sponge poacher in the preserve, but Bud and Sandy tell Po of his illegal activities.

title: The Second Time Around
description: Po and Sandy rescue a despondent former water ski champion, now in a wheelchair, and her mother from a hurricane. Flipper gets tangled in a fishnet.

title: Lady and the Dolphin: Part 1
description: A congresswoman visits the park with an eye to its possible closure -- and to sending Flipper to a naval scientific program.

title: Lady and the Dolphin: Part 2
description: Hap pressures the boys to take Congresswoman Browning on an underwater tour of the park as she considers its possible closure, but technical problems threaten the lives of the divers.

title: Danger
description: After Hap tells the boy a tall tale about catching a fish, the boys con him into going fishing with them the following day. However, there is danger close by in the form of a father and son reunion.

title: The Misanthrope
description: When a cranky man chases the boys from his boat, they decide he's up to no good. But when they return they meet a couple of thieves who really ARE up to no good. Their trusting the wrong people could get them killed.

title: Flipper's Bank Account
description: The park is overrun by treasure-seekers when Bud and Hap get excited by a dubloon found by Flipper.

title: Lifeguard
description: Flipper saves a woman from drowning. Porter Ricks contacts her husband and, when he hears his wife's story, decides to do one more study to see if Flipper really can save lives.

title: The Day of the Shark
description: Po tells Bud to keep flipper safely away while he and Sandy accompany Dr. Tollner on a shark-repellent experiment, but Bud disobeys.

title: Love and Sandy
description: Sandy falls for an older woman, Bonnie, while they search for her strayed sea lion Sparky, and Bud inadvertently sends Sparky off with flipper to an alligator-infested cove.

title: Money to Blow
description: Bud would do anything to get out of getting a job, but his father has laid down the law. When Bud and Flipper find an underwater treasure, Bud things all his troubles are over. He spends the money all over town, then things really get bad.

title: Flipper's Treasure
description: Porter Ricks hires someone to bring up a treasure from the ocean floor after Flipper discovers it.

title: The White Dolphin
description: A rare white dolphin is discovered by Flipper and by a money-hungry man who wants to capture him. The boys and Porter Ricks fight to find a way to save the dolphin, knowing if he stays free in the ocean his life would remain in danger. But, can they save him in time?

title: Teamwork
description: Porter receives a warning of toxic chemicals being dumped somewhere, but they aren't sure where. Meanwhile, a swim race is about to start. Sandy is excited about being in it. But complications arise when Porter discovers the toxic chemicals and almost dies.

title: Flipper and the Elephant: Part 1
description: Bonnie McCoy is back, this time with her father and different animals. After they are shipwrecked, Porter saves them. But they have a man after their elephant and he is determined to get it and send it to a zoo.

title: Flipper and the Elephant: Part 2
description: Bonnie talks Sandy and Bud into helping her get the elephant and chimp into a circus, but in order to get there they have to go through some dangerous trails.

title: Flipper and the Elephant: Part 3
description: McCoy comes up with the $200 to pay Samson, but is soon arrested and accused of stealing Samson's briefcase. The kids must raise enough money for bail or McCoy will lose his new job.

title: Bud Minds Baby
description: After sending Flipper away, Bud gets trapped in a lonely buoy with little Tina.

title: Sailor Bud
description: After a diver is found dead, Porter Ricks closes the park and orders that no one is in allowed in the water while an investigation into the unexplained death goes on. Bud, however, doesn't think that means he can't be in a boat in the open sea. But when the same thing happens to a diver, he must get the man and woman back to shore before the tide comes in!

title: The Call of the Dolphin
description: The boys fear they are loosing their best friend when Flipper chooses dolphin noises over them, even putting Bud's life in danger.

title: Flipper's Monster
description: When Flipper gives all his attention to the lady actress, Bud gets jealous. Even after his father warns him about the "green-eyed monster," Bud still takes matters in his own hands.

title: Flipper and the Mermaid
description: Porter is not happy with the new lady scientist who seems to have taken over the park. And worse - she takes Flipper to help her.

title: Dolphin in Pursuit: Part 1
description: The Ricks', in need of some TLC, take off to a nearby island to go camping. On their way they get word that there is an escaped convict at large. Porter gets permission to continue on his vacation, but after his boat is stolen, he gets a feeling that this is no vacation. Flipper takes off in hot pursuit!

title: Dolphin in Pursuit: Part 2
description: The Ricks are stranded on a uninhabited island and Flipper are missing as the convicted killer, Al Bardeman, is getting further and further away. Can Flipper save them?

title: Flipper's Hour of Peril
description: Flipper is in grave danger when he gets trapped in a net that's attached to a mine bomb in rough waters near a rocks. Porter and the boys must free him before the whole family gets blown up.

title: Coral Fever
description: Flipper is injured during an explosions and the doctor announces that Flipper may not live. Porter tries to get to the bottom of who set off that explosion and why while the boys take vigil at Flipper's side, praying he pulls through.

title: Junior Ranger
description: A young ranger trainee has arrived at Coral Key to meet with Porter Ricks. It doesn't take long for the Ricks to figure out that this new ranger is cocky and needs to be taught what a real ranger is all about - following the rules. He endangers Bud's life by disobeying his advice then blames it on Bud. Will this Ranger ever "get" what it's all about?

title: The Ditching: Part 1
description: Sandy talks Porter into letting him travel with Flipper in the plane while Porter stays on the Island with the pretty lady. Flipper is on his way to the lab to be studied for awhile. But a flock of birds puts Flipper, Sandy, and the others on the plane in grave danger.

title: The Ditching: Part 2
description: While the plane's crew continue to try to get Sandy out from under the large crate that has him pinned, a county-wide search and rescue is on but the plane is like a pea in a great big ocean. Can Flipper help?

title: Flipper and the Spy
description: After a mishap with a space shuttle, they report a missing probe that has classified information on it. While Porter and Bud go in search on the high seas, Sandy is left at home to man the radio. But an official comes and orders Sandy and Flipper to help him search for it. The trouble is, the man may not be who he seems.

title: Dolphin Patrol
description: After a hurricane hits the island, the waters are infested with sharks. Porter doesn't know it, but his sons are in grave danger when they try to go in search of a specimen to keep Bud out of trouble for flunking Science.

title: A Job for Sandy
description: Sandy has an opportunity to watch a stunt man perform an underwater stunt, but when he injures his back, Sandy decides to take over the stunt without anyone knowledge.

title: Flipper and the Horse Thieves
description: Bud is showing Flipper to his friend Stevie. Meanwhile, two thieves steal away with Stevie's very valuable show horse. Flipper helps to get it back.

title: Flipper and the Bounty
description: Bud is fascinated when an old ship called the Bounty arrives at Corral Key Park. Without anyone's knowledge, he decides to sneak on board and explore.

title: Shark Hunt
description: There is another shark breakout in the preserve, and Porter has his hands full with getting rid of them, saving stupid divers, closing the park to swimmers, and keeping Flipper alive.

title: Flipper, the Detective
description: An eye witness identifies Porter Ricks as being the man that robbed his boat. Flipper and the boys must prove his innocence.

title: Flipper's Odyssey: Part 1
description: Flipper is captured by fisherman and brought to a marine exhibit more than 200 miles from Coral Key. When Peter and his sons find out, they hurriedly sail their boat up the coast searching for him. Meanwhile, Flipper tries to escape and find his way back home.

title: Flipper's Odyssey: Part 2
description: Flipper is captured by fishermen and brought to a marine exhibit more than 200 miles from Coral Key. When Peter and his sons find out, they hurriedly sail their boat up the coast searching for him. Meanwhile, Flipper tries to escape and find his way back home.

title: Flipper's Odyssey: Part 3
description: Flipper is captured by fishermen and brought to a marine exhibit more than 200 miles from Coral Key. When Peter and his sons find out, they hurriedly sail their boat up the coast searching for him. Meanwhile, Flipper tries to escape and find his way back home.

title: Slingshot
description: The truck that Bud, his friend Stevie and oceanographer Ulla Norstrand are driving in swerves off the road and lands in a drainage canal, trapping them inside shortly before the floodgates are scheduled to be opened. Flipper swims to try to save them.

title: Flipper and the Shark Cage
description: Bud disobeys his father and breaks a lot of rules, putting himself in grave danger inside a shark cage on the bottom of the ocean without anyone's knowledge.

title: The Lobster Trap
description: When Bud catches to teenagers trapping lobsters out of season, they threaten Sandy's run for presidency to keep him quiet. Bud's silence later put's Flipper's life in grave danger.

title: Air Power
description: Sandy and Bud buy an air boat with the intention of charging tourists. But when they go into the everglades to mark their route, Flipper follows them and gets stuck under a hot sun.

title: Gift Dolphin
description: A visiting prince takes a liking to Flipper--so much so that he puts in a request with the U.S. State Department that he be given Flipper as a present. The State Department pressures Porter to grant the prince his request.

title: The Raccoon Who Came to Dinner
description: A "higher-up" who has the power to shut the park down comes to visit the park and Porter Ricks. His hatred for wild animals, and Bud's dislike of him, just may put Porter's job in danger.

title: Flipper Joins the Navy: Part 1
description: A troubled Dolphin worth a million dollars is having nervous breakdowns. Porter and Flipper are called in to see if they can figure out how to help him.

title: Flipper Joins the Navy: Part 2
description: It seems everybody is out looking for the Million Dollar dolphin who got away while he was visiting the Ricks recovering from a nervous breakdown.

title: Flipper's Underwater Museum
description: A top secret transmitter is stolen by a spy. Bud builds an underwater adventure that will blow your mind.

title: Deep Waters
description: Porter and Ulla are are in 'deep water' when the submarine they are in breaks on the bottom of the ocean floor 250 feet down. They only have one hour of oxygen.

title: Dolphin Love: Part 1
description: Flipper has met the love of his life and would rather spend time with her then with the Ricks. Bud is jealous and doesn't understand why his pet would abandon him for a girl.

title: Dolphin Love: Part 2
description: Flipper is very upset at his girlfriend's injury and races to save her life. But he'll need the Rick's help to do it.

title: Agent Bud
description: A plane crashes in the ocean with two men trapped inside and Flipper is the only one who knows where they are. Fortunately the plane is sealed tight so no water is inside, but how much air do they have left?

title: Disaster in the Everglades: Part 1
description: While checking on a poaching complaint, Porter is injured and captured by an alligator poacher and taken to his camp. When he's late for a camping trip with his sons, they worry and contact the coast guard.

title: Disaster in the Everglades: Part 2
description: While the boys wait on word from the Coast Guard on the whereabouts for their father and Flipper continues to search the ocean for the missing father, Porter tries to find a way to escape and get home.

title: Lost Dolphin
description: Bud disobeys Sandy and goes out to watch an explosion which effects Flipper and gives him amnesia.

title: The Warning
description: The animals are acting strangely and even Flipper is heading out to sea. The boys tell their father, but he blows them off. Still, they believe something bad is just about to happen. Will they figure out WHAT in time?

title: Cupid Flipper
description: Sandy has met a girl he really likes, but she doesn't seem to want to spend time with him. Instead, she wants to spend time with Porter.

title: An Errand for Flipper
description: Sandy sends Flipper on an important mission to deliver something to Porter he needs to repair the plane so he can make it to an important meeting in time. Flipper has to make a few stops along the way.

title: Whale Ahoy
description: Bud has an essay to write about whale-hunting. While thinking about it he goes to sleep in his skiff and has a strange dream. Before his eyes, Captain Peabody is about to harpoon the animal but the whale flips the skiff over.

title: Explosion
description: A friend of the Ricks' wants to earn some fast money to send his brother to school. He offers to help do some blasting by lying to the foreman, after the professional they hired is critically injured.

title: Executive Bud
description: Bud has formed his own business and hired other kids to do the work while he "supervises," only taking 1/3 of the cut for himself. But he's a hard taskmaster and gives no breaks.

title: Flipper and the Puppy
description: An injured man out at sea has to jump ship when his boat catches on fire. He's able to get his dog off, but he floats away and when Porter and Sandy find him, the dog is no where to be found. But, Flipper is on the job.

title: Flipper's Island
description: Porter is trying to get an island named after them and leaves the boys alone on the island to map it out for two days. But what Porter doesn't know is that they are not alone. Danger lurks very near.

title: Alligator Duel
description: After showing off, Flipper is stolen by some men trying to make a movies involving attacks of alligators. They want Flipper to be the star.

title: Flipper and the Fugitive: Part 1
description: In the aftermath of a hurricane, Flipper discovers a man unconscious in his boat and tows the boat to a beach. Porter rescues the obvious bank robber and takes him back to his home, unaware of who the stranger really is.

title: Flipper and the Fugitive: Part 2
description: While the Ricks are being held hostage in their home, Flipper desperately tries to get someone to help them.

title: The Most Expensive Sardine in the World
description: A lobster is wearing an expensive diamond, but Flipper is accused of swallowing it. He's in danger of being cut open to retrieve the expensive bracelet by a court order.

title: Flipper and the Seal
description: When part of Porter's specimen comes up missing, he blames the new kid on the beach. Meanwhile, Bud is trying to develop a roll of film.

title: Dolphins Don't Sleep
description: Instead of shooting the saw fish with his tranquilizer dart, the hunter shoots Flipper. But dolphins cannot sleep underwater. They boys must get him the antidote before he dies.

title: Aunt Martha
description: Porter's Aunt Martha has come to visit for the first time since Porter's wife died. She instantly decides to take over, and her first order of business is sending Flipper out to sea because she believes all wild animals can be dangerous.

title: Dolphin for Ransom
description: When Porter orders a teenager to be in court early Monday morning for poaching lobsters, he revenges Porter by stealing Flipper and holding him for Ransom.

title: A Dolphin in Time
description: Scott Emson is trying to study sharks, but Flipper doesn't seem to understand he wants the sharks - not saved!

title: Decision for Bud
description: A scientist goes to Bud to ask his permission to take Flipper for a special study. He and Bud make a deal, but then Flipper is called upon to help find a missing diver.

title: The Firing Line: Part 1
description: Porter leaves Sandy and Bud in charge while he goes to take care of some business for the day. He even tells them that they can open his mail when it comes. They do as instructed, only to find a check that says "termination pay" on it. Bud and Sandy are distressed about having to leave Coral Key, so they set out to find their father a job. You wouldn't think they could get into any trouble but...

title: The Firing Line: Part 2
description: Sandy and Bud took a short cut on the way to their errand and end up in the middle of an active shooting range. While they are stuck there being shot at after their motor is struck, Porter Ricks desperately looks for his boys, then tries to save them from being killed.

title: Devil Ray
description: A large sting ray has shown up in Coral key park and everyone is afraid of it. Porter is told he must get rid of it - one way or another.

title: Cap'n Flint
description: There's trouble brewing when Capn' Flent, the talking parrot, get's loose on his raft and floats right into the part of the ocean an explosion is about to happen.

title: Flipper's New Friends: Part 1
description: A new family moves into the park, and Flipper befriends them. But the children's curiosity gets them stranded on an island and nobody knows where they are.

title: Flipper's New Friends: Part 2
description: Flipper and the dog try to get help to two lost children stranded on a deserted island.
